about.summary: Output formats and utilities for authoring books and technical documents with R Markdown.
Output formats and utilities for authoring books and technical documents with R Markdown.

name: r-bookdown
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.43" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-bookdown
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/bookdown_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/bookdown/bookdown_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 911a207c7ab0ccd29245e245f45142b2f01bc5a70d1516425138b6643fff0be0

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-htmltools >=0.3.6
    - r-jquerylib
    - r-knitr >=1.31
    - r-rmarkdown >=2.9
    - r-tinytex >=0.12
    - r-xfun >=0.22
    - r-yaml >=2.1.19
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-htmltools >=0.3.6
    - r-jquerylib
    - r-knitr >=1.31
    - r-rmarkdown >=2.9
    - r-tinytex >=0.12
    - r-xfun >=0.22
    - r-yaml >=2.1.19

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('bookdown')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('bookdown')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/rstudio/bookdown
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Output formats and utilities for authoring books and technical documents with R Markdown.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - bsennblad
    - ConorIA

# Maintainer: Yihui Xie <xie@yihui.name>
# Description: Output formats and utilities for authoring books and technical documents with R Markdown.
# License: GPL-3
# Imports: htmltools (>= 0.3.6), knitr (>= 1.22), rmarkdown (>= 1.12), xfun (>= 0.6), tinytex (>= 0.12)
# Suggests: htmlwidgets, rstudioapi, miniUI, rsconnect (>= 0.4.3), servr (>= 0.13), shiny, testit (>= 0.9), tufte, webshot
# URL: https://github.com/rstudio/bookdown
# BugReports: https://github.com/rstudio/bookdown/issues
# SystemRequirements: Pandoc (>= 1.17.2)
# LazyData: TRUE
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Encoding: UTF-8
# NeedsCompilation: no
